name: NEPH_MODALITY_EPISODE
description: The NEPH_MODALITY_EPISODE table stores the link between a patient's dialysis modality episode and its associated clinical episode.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: CLINICAL_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The clinical episode ID associated with the dialysis modality episode.

columns.name: NEPH_TREATMENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to store a patient's type of dialysis treatment.
